pullrequest.title: Fix cleanup of visual with plugins that have callbacks

content.html:
I think this fixes it:

diff -r d44c13b597ad gazebo/gui/model/JointMaker.cc
--- a/gazebo/gui/model/JointMaker.cc    Tue Sep 13 18:40:25 2016 -0700
+++ b/gazebo/gui/model/JointMaker.cc    Wed Sep 14 13:44:11 2016 -0700
@@ -267,21 +267,12 @@

   if (joint->visual)
   {
-    scene->RemoveVisual(joint->visual);
     joint->visual->Fini();
   }

   if (joint->jointVisual)
   {
-    auto parentAxisVis = joint->jointVisual->GetParentAxisVisual();
-    if (parentAxisVis)
-    {
-      parentAxisVis->GetParent()->DetachVisual(parentAxisVis->GetName());
-      scene->RemoveVisual(parentAxisVis);
-    }
-    joint->jointVisual->GetParent()->DetachVisual(
-        joint->jointVisual->GetName());
-    scene->RemoveVisual(joint->jointVisual);
+    joint->jointVisual->Fini();
   }

   if (joint->inspector)
@@ -1911,4 +1902,3 @@
 {
   this->dataPtr->userCmdManager = _manager;
 }
-

calling Fini on the top level visual should now take care of removing all the children
